name: Ultimation Gravity Roller Conveyor – 24" Wide x 5' Long Heavy Duty Steel Frame with Polyurethane Rollers – Adjustable Centers for Woodworking, Metal, and Assembly Support
short_description: 24” overall width (from outside of frame to outside of frame), 22” between frames, 5' length
1.5” diameter steel rollers fabricated from galvanized steel with polyurethane covers, 6" roller centers. Frames are pre-prepared with additional holes to accept roller centers of 3″, 4-1/2″, or 6"
Steel frame 2-1/2” deep x 1” flange, 12ga. powder-coated steel
Polyurethane covers on rollers reduce application noise, increase grip between product and roller, and extend the life of rollers by reducing wear and tear

Maximum load capacity when conveyor frame is fully supported: 360 pounds These conveyors are designed for operations indoors, however with galvanized rollers and powder coated steel frames they are able to survive harsh outdoor conditions well
product_description: An Ultimation gravity conveyor section includes the conveyor frame as well as rollers. This model features galvanized steel rollers with pre-fitted polyurethane roller covers. Polyurethane sleeves can be used in the temperature range of -80°F to 200°F (-62°C to 93°C). Gravity conveyors are considered one of the most cost-effective and versatile product lines on the market. These conveyor systems are excellent for both temporary and permanent conveyor lines found in assembly areas, shipping departments, warehouses, and more. Gravity curves and spur options can add to the versatility of straight conveyors. Gravity roller conveyors can support heavier loads than alternative skate wheel type conveyors. The Ultimation gravity conveyors are available in lengths of 3’, 5’, and 10’, with widths of 12”, 15”, 18”, 24”, 30”, 36”, and wider!
